title: UK launches new global coalition to address climate change impacts
lead: The Adaptation Action Coalition has been developed by the UK in partnership with Bangladesh, Egypt, Malawi, the Netherlands, Saint Lucia and the UN

title: Melting away: Earth lost 28 trillion tonnes of ice between 1994 and 2017
lead: The loss is equivalent to a 100-metre thick sheet of ice covering the whole of the UK, according to new research

title: Pilotless hydrogen-powered jets for domestic flights?
lead: The plan is to automate a light utility aircraft that could carry up to 19 passengers travelling through the ‘UK’s first’ zero carbon regional network

title: future Net Zero hits first milestone!
lead: We have much more content planned for year two including all the build up to COP26

title: Scotch whisky industry toasts to net zero spirits by 2040
lead: The Scotch Whisky Association has also pledged to have all new product packaging reusable, recyclable and compostable by 2025

title: Clash of the titans: GE files patent infringement suit against Siemens Gamesa Renewable Energy
lead: Siemens Gamesa anticipates that the lawsuit will not affect its current and future projects

title: British prisons to lock up emissions
lead: The switch to LEDs at the HMP Elmley prison in Kent could save the Ministry of Justice £115,000

title: Concrete plans to recycle Danish turbines
lead: Scheme will recycle turbine blades for use in cement industry. Danes want to be seen as world’s best in reusing wind tech

title: Biden signs executive order to replace entire government fleet with EVs
lead: The new electrification plan could affect over 645,000 vehicles

title: Could magnets in MRI scanners unlock the key to generating more wind energy?
lead: A team of GE engineers has been awarded additional funding to apply decades of healthcare experience to develop a more powerful superconducting generator for offshore wind turbines
